components.name: CustomSnackbarComponent
components.template: {{ data.message }}

components.name: EditDialogComponent
components.template:
Payment successful

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Consequatur amet labore.

components.name: LaunchDialogComponent
components.template:
<button
  type="button"
  class="rounded-md bg-indigo-600 px-3.5 py-2.5 text-sm font-semibold text-white shadow-sm hover:bg-indigo-500 focus-visible:outline focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-600"
  (click)="openDialog()"
>
  Open dialog
</button>

components.name: LaunchSnackbarComponent
components.template:
<button
  type="button"
  class="rounded-md bg-indigo-600 px-3.5 py-2.5 text-sm font-semibold text-white shadow-sm hover:bg-indigo-500 focus-visible:outline focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-indigo-600"
  (click)="openSnackBar()"
>
  {{ default ? 'Open default snackbar' : 'Open custom snackbar' }}
</button>

GroupedAutocompletePanel
variables.rawdescription: Autocomplete panel inject in a input with grouped options

variables.name: GroupedAutocompletePanelTemplate
variables.defaultValue:
(args: any) => {
  return {
    template: `
    <input
    type="text"
    placeholder="Select a value"
    [uiAutocomplete]="auto"
    [autocompleteDisplayKey]="'optionName'"
    (opened)="openedAutocompletePanel()"
    (closed)="closesAutocompletePanel()"
    (optionSelected)="selectedOption($event)"
    class="relative w-full rounded-md border-0 p-1.5 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset sm:leading-6 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset"
  >
  <ui-autocomplete #auto>
  <ui-option [isGroup]="true" *ngFor="let option of GROUPED_OPTIONS">
    {{option.optionName}}
    <ui-option *ngFor="let child of option.channels" [value]="child">
    {{child.optionName}}
    <ng-container ngProjectsAs="icon">
    <ui-icon
      icon="edit"
      [size]="18"
    ></ui-icon>
    </ng-container>
  </ui-option>
  </ui-option>
  <ui-autocomplete>
    `,
    props: {
      ...args,
      GROUPED_OPTIONS,
      openedAutocompletePanel,
      closesAutocompletePanel,
      selectedOption,
    },
  };
}

variables.name: SimpleAutocompletePanelTemplate
variables.defaultValue:
(args: any) => {
  return {
    component: AutocompleteComponent,
    template: `
      <input
        type="text"
        placeholder="Select a value"
        [uiAutocomplete]="auto"
        [autocompleteDisplayKey]="'label'"
        (opened)="openedAutocompletePanel()"
        (closed)="closesAutocompletePanel()"
        (optionSelected)="selectedOption($event)"
        class="relative w-full rounded-md border-0 p-1.5 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset sm:leading-6 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset"
      >
      <ui-autocomplete #auto>
      <ui-option *ngFor="let option of SIMPLE_OPTIONS" [value]="option">
        {{option.label}}
        <ng-container ngProjectsAs="icon">
        <ui-icon
          icon="edit"
          [size]="18"
        ></ui-icon>
        </ng-container>
      </ui-option>
      <ui-autocomplete>
    `,
    props: {
      ...args,
      SIMPLE_OPTIONS,
      openedAutocompletePanel,
      closesAutocompletePanel,
      selectedOption,
    },
  };
}

 selected id {{ element.id }}
`, props: { ...args, pagedTableData, sortTableByKey, columnDefinitionArray, }, }; }

libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.name: FormControlTemplate
libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.defaultValue:
(args: any) => { formControl.setValue(SIMPLE_OPTIONS[2]); return { template: ` {{option.label}}

value: {{formControl.value | json}}

touched: {{formControl.touched}}

`, props: { ...args, SIMPLE_OPTIONS, formControl, openedAutocompletePanel, closesAutocompletePanel, selectedOption, }, }; }

libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.name: GROUPED_OPTIONS
GroupedAutocompletePanel
libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.rawdescription: Autocomplete panel inject in a input with grouped options
libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.description: Autocomplete panel inject in a input with grouped options

libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.name: GroupedAutocompletePanelTemplate
libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.defaultValue:
(args: any) => {
  return {
    template: `
    <input
    type="text"
    placeholder="Select a value"
    [uiAutocomplete]="auto"
    [autocompleteDisplayKey]="'optionName'"
    (opened)="openedAutocompletePanel()"
    (closed)="closesAutocompletePanel()"
    (optionSelected)="selectedOption($event)"
    class="relative w-full rounded-md border-0 p-1.5 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset sm:leading-6 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset"
  >
  <ui-autocomplete #auto>
  <ui-option [isGroup]="true" *ngFor="let option of GROUPED_OPTIONS">
    {{option.optionName}}
    <ui-option *ngFor="let child of option.channels" [value]="child">
    {{child.optionName}}
    <ng-container ngProjectsAs="icon">
    <ui-icon
      icon="edit"
      [size]="18"
    ></ui-icon>
    </ng-container>
  </ui-option>
  </ui-option>
  <ui-autocomplete>
    `,
    props: {
      ...args,
      GROUPED_OPTIONS,
      openedAutocompletePanel,
      closesAutocompletePanel,
      selectedOption,
    },
  };
}

libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.name: openedAutocompletePanel
libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.rawdescription: Callback to test the autocomplete directive opened event
libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.description: Callback to test the autocomplete directive opened event

libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.name: selectedOption

libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.name: SimpleAutocompletePanel
libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.rawdescription: Autocomplete panel inject in a input with simples (not grouped) options
libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.description: Autocomplete panel inject in a input with simples (not grouped) options

libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.name: SimpleAutocompletePanelTemplate
libs/ui/src/lib/autocomplete/autocomplet.defaultValue:
(args: any) => {
  return {
    component: AutocompleteComponent,
    template: `
      <input
        type="text"
        placeholder="Select a value"
        [uiAutocomplete]="auto"
        [autocompleteDisplayKey]="'label'"
        (opened)="openedAutocompletePanel()"
        (closed)="closesAutocompletePanel()"
        (optionSelected)="selectedOption($event)"
        class="relative w-full rounded-md border-0 p-1.5 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset sm:leading-6 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset"
      >
      <ui-autocomplete #auto>
      <ui-option *ngFor="let option of SIMPLE_OPTIONS" [value]="option">
        {{option.label}}
        <ng-container ngProjectsAs="icon">
        <ui-icon
          icon="edit"
          [size]="18"
        ></ui-icon>
        </ng-container>
      </ui-option>
      <ui-autocomplete>
    `,
    props: {
      ...args,
      SIMPLE_OPTIONS,
      openedAutocompletePanel,
      closesAutocompletePanel,
      selectedOption,
    },
  };
}

libs/ui/src/lib/table/table.component.st.name: Template
libs/ui/src/lib/table/table.component.st.defaultValue:
(args: any) => { const pagedTableData = tableData.filter((el, index) => index < 10); return { template: `
name {{ element.name }} email {{ element.email.value }} phone {{ element.phone.value }} city {{ element.cityVal }} active
{{element.isValid ? 'Completed' : 'Error' }}
 selected id {{ element.id }}
`, props: { ...args, pagedTableData, sortTableByKey, columnDefinitionArray, }, }; }
